select
from tcd_user_role ur inner join tcd_role_permission rp on rp.role_id = ur.role_id inner join tcd_permission p on p.id = rp.permission_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and ur.is_deleted = 0 and rp.is_deleted = 0 and p.is_deleted = 0

select p.permission_value from tcd_user_role ur inner join tcd_role_permission rp on rp.role_id = ur.role_id inner join tcd_permission p on p.id = rp.permission_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and p.type = 2 and ur.is_deleted = 0 and rp.is_deleted = 0 and p.is_deleted = 0

select p.permission_value from tcd_permission p inner join tcd_role_permission rp on rp.permission_id = p.id inner join tcd_role r on r.id = rp.role_id where r.role_name = '系统管理员' and p.type = 2 and p.is_deleted = 0 and rp.is_deleted = 0 and r.is_deleted = 0
